errors.not_found: The requested resource was not found.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.server_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.conflict: A conflict occurred with existing data.
errors.unprocessable_entity: The request was well-formed but could not be processed.
errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
errors.service_unavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.unsupported_media_type: The provided media type is not supported.
errors.method_not_allowed: The HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.
errors.request_timeout: The request took too long. Please try again.
